page.title: 19Home Life Flintham/Syerston.
page.content:
Those working on the farms tend to eat their{main meal}at mid-day as do the retired who have lived in the villages all their lives. Meals on Wheels are delivered to some of the retired in Flintham.
There is a noticeable trend in both villages, especially among the younger people towards{healthier eating;}more} fruit and vegetables and wholefoods generally. A minor miracle occurred when a 'naughty' boy was transformed with the removal of additives from his diet.
As in all villages there is a lot of gossiping but none of it is malicious, more friendly interest in one another. Both villages are caring villages and if anyone needs help of any kind there will always be someone to lend a hand.
